info.name: Unity Forum Dark Skin
info.description: Dark skin userstyle for the Unity Forums, compatible as of July 2018
info.additionalInfo:
Note that code posted in a forum thread can't be user stylesheeted because the colors are hardcoded in the individual span tags inside. Some icons are jpg and have a permanent white background on them.

Userstyle link at: https://gist.github.com/AnomalousUnderdog/f95a68064f5df1865ceceb1e117a27c1/raw/UnityForumDarkAU.user.css
